description: This file defines a Flutter provider named WalletProvider that manages the runtime state for wallet entries, including loading, filtering, CRUD operations, and calculating totals. It interacts with a WalletRepository for data persistence and exposes APIs for UI components to consume.

classes.name: WalletProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier-based provider managing wallet entries, filters, and aggregates for a Flutter app.

methods.name: init
methods.description: Initializes the provider and loads data for the first time.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Reloads entries and totals with current filters.

methods.name: setDateRange
methods.description: Sets the date filter range and reloads data.

methods.name: setCategory
methods.description: Sets the category filter and reloads data.

methods.name: setType
methods.description: Sets the type filter (income/expense) and reloads data.

methods.name: clearFilters
methods.description: Clears all filters and reloads data.

methods.name: addEntry
methods.description: Creates a new wallet entry and reloads data.

methods.name: editEntry
methods.description: Updates an existing wallet entry and reloads data.

methods.name: deleteEntry
methods.description: Deletes a wallet entry by ID and reloads data.

methods.name: getById
methods.description: Retrieves a wallet entry by its ID from the current cache.

methods.name: categoriesInView
methods.description: Returns a list of unique categories present in current entries.
